news.title: RELIANCE: Strong Q3 Results Exceed Expectations
news.content: Reliance Industries reported strong Q3 earnings with net profit of ₹16,500 cr, beating estimates.

news.title: Banking Sector Rally as RBI Hints Rate Cut
news.content: Banking stocks surge on expectations of RBI rate cut in next policy review.

news.title: IT Sector Under Pressure on Global Growth Concerns
news.content: Global tech spending slowdown weighs on Indian IT stocks as client spending remains cautious.

news.title: Asian Paints Gains on New Product Launch
news.content: Asian Paints launches premium eco-friendly paint range targeting high-end residential market.

news.title: Larsen & Toubro Bags ₹5,000 Cr Infrastructure Contract
news.content: L&T wins significant infrastructure project order, strengthening order book for FY2024-25.
